color.title: Hex Color Generator
color.description: Change background color by clicking inside the circle or pressing the spacebar. The hex color is printed below. This project was built with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.

color.title: Select and Color
color.description: Paste some text and select it to see it appear full of color. This project uses the skeleton CSS responsive boilerplate, vanilla JavaScript and the selecting.js and chroma.js libraries.

sound.title: Guitar Tuner
sound.description: Click inside the circles or press the numbers shown and listen. This project was built with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.

layout.title: Flexbox Cards
layout.description: A series of cards with descriptions and pictures of famous architects. Responsive Layout made with Flexbox.

layout.title: Iso Gallery
layout.description: Responsive gallery with a Masonry Layout, built with Isotope.js.

time.title: JavaScript Clock
time.description: Simple digital clock made with vanilla JS.

random.title: Random Quote Machine
random.description: Random programming quotes delivered by the Storm Consultancy's API. Get a quote on click and tweet it if it has less than 140 characters. This project was made with vanilla JavaScript and deployed with Surge.

random.title: 9 Random
random.description: Get 9 random images from https://unsplash.it every time you refresh the page or press the refresh button. Built with vanilla JavaScript.

random.title: Giphy 6
random.description: Get 6 gifs trending with the progamming tag. Made with the Giphy API, vanilla JavaScript and deployed with Surge.

random.title: LightBox Image Gallery
random.description: Simple image gallery built with the lightgallery.js library.

react.title: Youtube React App
react.description: React App to search videos from the Youtube API. Built with create-react-app. (Working on it to make it responsive)

react.title: Spotify React App
react.description: React App to search for artists with the Spotify API. It displays and allows to play the first 10 songs. Built with create-react-app. (Working on it to make it responsive)
